info.summary:
Caroline Haythornthwaite works as a Director, Professor, Researcher in Graduate School of Library and Information Science|University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, and his\her h-index is 29, g-index is 76. His\Her interests are :
 Social Networks; Online Communities; Virtual Community; Online Learning; Social Networking;
